testcase.name: Verify that user should able to search product , apply filter and verify the details of the selected product - Using_Parameter
testcase.system-out: Given Launching the browser.................................................passed When user should able to enter "Noise Cancellation headphone" in search textbox.passed And user click on search button.............................................passed Then user should verify the search landing page.............................passed When user should able select "10 - 20" facet................................passed And user should able select "Sony" facet....................................passed And user should able select "JBL" facet.....................................passed And user should able select "Marshall" facet................................passed And user should able to list down the product name, INR Price, Offer of the available brand "Sony","JBL","Marshall".passed Then user should able to verify the brand name price and offer of the selected product "Sony" or "JBL" or "Marshall".passed And close browser...........................................................passed
